author: Keith Rozario
content:
That's absolutely correct, but a private proxy site you installed on keithrozario.com (or your own site) isn't going to get anyone's attention. Normally the traffic flowing through a proxy site you use for facebook would be minimal compared to everything and it should slide.

Network administrators usually only block proxy sites they know (as identified by URL or IP) , so something you created yourself is likely to slip 'under the radar'
